name: UnifiedAttribute
description: The unified attribute for a Rangeslide (Image)

content.name: x
content.description:
the X position of the port
default: 0.0

content.name: y
content.description:
the Y position of the port
default: 0.0

content.name: angle
content.description:
the angle of the port
default: 0.0

content.name: width
content.description:
the width of the port
default: 10.0

content.name: height
content.description:
the height of the port
default: 100.0

content.name: handle_height_percentage
content.description:
the hight of the slide's handle as a percentage of the total height of the slide
default: 0.1

content.name: span_width_percentage
content.description:
the width of the spanning area as a percentage of the total width of the rangeslide
default: 0.75

content.name: active
content.description:
whether the part should be interactable or not
default: true

content.name: reset_value
content.description:
the positions at which the handles will return to when the part is double-clicked. If no value is provided, the resetting functionality will not be active
default: -none-

content.name: style_start_handle
content.description: the image for the started handle

content.name: style_end_handle
content.description: the image for the end handle
